title: Healthcare Practical Competency Enhancement: Short-Intensive Workshop for Online Educational Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental educational theories and basic understanding of online learning platform usage
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more strategies considering learner engagement and content relevance when designing online education.
Learners can apply two or more instructional strategies for effective online class management in mobile environments.
Learners can propose a three-step process to address unexpected online education environment issues.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
